name: Deepr Diver
description:
Created for Ludum Dare 48: Deeper and Deeper

Dive deep. Deeper than anyone, EVER. What will you find? Can you survive? Will you be able to return?

Everything created by me using this awesome softwares/resources:

  • Pyxel Edit: https://pyxeledit.com/
  • Pallete: https://lospec.com/palette-list/2bit-demiboy
  • Font: https://www.dafont.com/pt/upheaval.font
  • Music: https://boscaceoil.net/
  • Source: https://github.com/vitorfgd/ludum-dare-48-deeper-and-deeper

Guide:

Press space bar to dive. 

You may find difficult to stay on course but maybe this is for the best.
